Annalena Dittmann will defend her doctoral thesis titled "Targeting acute myeloid leukaemia via the leukaemic matrisome interface" on December 12th, 2025 at 12:00 in F101, Kontinkangas Campus, University of Oulu.

**Opponent**: Academy Research Fellow Dr. James Conway
